title: Man, of all the people that could get permabanned from the boards
body:
You guys target poor little Top PIz?

That's harsh, man. He wouldn't hurt a fly.

http://i.imgur.com/9tJMqTs.png

"No changes in posting behaviour even though your last string of offenses was two-three months ago." Seems like a change in posting behaviour to me, guys. 

What did he do? Make a thread about how he won't judge you and doesn't care what you say as long as you don't lie to him? Really terrible guy you're removing from the boards here to protect us from, Riot. Really terrible guy. 

I actually don't even have anything to say this time around. You permabanned Top PIz. 

_Top PIz, of all people._

Wow.
